content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Por lo tanto':
Selecciona la traducción para 'Así que/Por lo tanto':

content.stimulus_en: I like him (because) ________ he is funny.
I stayed home (because) ________ it was raining.
He didn't study, (so) ________ he failed the test.
(although) ________ it was raining, I went out.
She was tired, (but) ________ she finished the work.
It was raining, (so) ________ I stayed home.
He bought a new car although he didn't have much money.
I to went bed early because I was very tired.
I'll call you as soon as I arrive, so don't worry.
She hard studied because she wanted to pass the exam.
Although it was very cold, we went for a walk.
The was food cold, so we complained to the waiter.
The modal or word for Razón is '________'.
